name: PicOS 95
description: Live like it's 1995! I made this a while back, and even allowed it to play a couple of my first games :D I made this back when I did't really know much about programming, and I haven't bothered nor do I plan to go back and make the code a million times better! Anyways, I'm uploading this because of the PicOS Jam, but not as a submission ;)
